mass_gap_event_rate.falsification: If < 5 events, AGN disk hypothesis in trouble. If > 100, need to revise AGN fraction.

spin_mass_correlation.prediction: Positive correlation: χ = 0.3 + 0.007 × (M - 30) for M > 50 M☉
spin_mass_correlation.test: Linear regression on LIGO O5 mass-gap events
spin_mass_correlation.discriminant: Slope > 0.005 → AGN disk; Slope ~ 0 → Pop III

host_galaxy_signatures.prediction_1: Host galaxies have AGN signatures (X-ray, radio, optical emission lines)
host_galaxy_signatures.test_1: Follow-up observations with Chandra, VLA, optical spectroscopy
host_galaxy_signatures.prediction_2: Redshift distribution peaks at z ~ 0.8-1.5 (AGN peak era)
host_galaxy_signatures.test_2: Redshift distribution of mass-gap events in O5
host_galaxy_signatures.prediction_3: Host stellar mass M* > 10^10.5 M☉ (massive galaxies)
host_galaxy_signatures.falsification: If hosts are dwarf galaxies or no AGN signatures, rules out AGN disk

eccentricity_constraints.prediction: Eccentricity e < 10^-4 at 10 Hz for mass-gap events from AGN disks
eccentricity_constraints.test: Improved eccentricity measurements with O5 sensitivity

population_synthesis.prediction_1: Bimodal mass distribution: peak at M ~ 30 M☉ (gen 0-1) and M ~ 100-140 M☉ (gen 2-4)
population_synthesis.prediction_2: Bimodal spin distribution: χ < 0.5 (60%) and χ > 0.85 (40%)
population_synthesis.prediction_3: Merger rate increases with redshift up to z ~ 2 (follows AGN activity)
population_synthesis.falsification: Uniform mass/spin distributions would rule out hierarchical mergers

gw231123_specific.prediction_1: Improved parameter estimation with O5 data (if similar events) → χ_eff > 0.9
gw231123_specific.prediction_2: Host galaxy has AGN (if localization < 100 deg²)
gw231123_specific.test_approach: Multi-messenger follow-up if similar event in O5
gw231123_specific.reasoning: BH-BH mergers in AGN disks are gas-poor at merger (cleared cavity)
gw231123_specific.test: EM follow-up of well-localized mass-gap events
